sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-app-bar
        class="px-3"
        dense="dense"
        color="light-blue lighten-5"
        flat
    >
      <v-btn
          fixed
          icon
          size="32"
          @click="openPage(selectedItem, 0)"
      >
        <v-avatar size="32">
          <v-img
              src="https://freepngimg.com/save/130245-letter-o-png-free-photo/1195x1195"
          ></v-img>
        </v-avatar>
      </v-btn>

      <v-spacer></v-spacer>

      <v-responsive centered max-width="300">
        <v-text-field
            dense
            flat
            hide-details
            label="Search..."
            rounded="lg"
            single-line
            variant="solo-filled"
            append-inner-icon="mdi-card-search"
        ></v-text-field>
      </v-responsive>

      <v-spacer></v-spacer>

      <v-btn
          fixed
          icon
          size="32"
          @click="openPage(3)"
      >
        <v-avatar size="32">
          <v-img
              src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1535713875002-d1d0cf377fde?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2080&q=80"
          ></v-img>
        </v-avatar>
      </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main class="bg-grey-lighten-3">
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" md="2">
            <v-sheet rounded="lg" min-height="268">
              <v-list dense rounded="lg">
                <v-list-item
                    v-model="selectedItemUp"
                    v-for="(item, index) in itemsUp"
                    :key="index"
                    @click="openPage(index)"
                >
                  <template v-slot:prepend>
                    <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
                  </template>

                  <v-list-item-title>{{ item.text }}</v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item>

                <v-divider class="my-2"></v-divider>

                <v-list-item
                    v-model="selectedItemDown"
                    v-for="(itemsDown, index) in itemsDown"
                    :key="index"
                    @click="openPage(index)"
                >
                  <template v-slot:prepend>
                    <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
                  </template>

                  <v-list-item-title>{{ item.text }}</v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item>
              </v-list>
            </v-sheet>
          </v-col>

          <v-col cols="12" md="8">
            <v-sheet min-height="70vh" rounded="lg">
              <router-view/>
            </v-sheet>
          </v-col>

          <v-col cols="12" md="2">
            <v-sheet rounded="lg" min-height="268">
              <!--  -->
            </v-sheet>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import router from "@/router";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedItemUp: null,
      itemsUp: [
        { text: 'Home', icon: 'mdi-home', url: '/' },
        { text: 'Explore', icon: 'mdi-pound-box', url: '/explore' },
        { text: 'Comments', icon: 'mdi-comment', url: '/comments' }
      ],
      selectedItemDown: null,
      itemsDown: [
        { text: 'Profile', icon: 'mdi-account', url: '/profile' },
        { text: 'Settings', icon: 'mdi-cog', url: '/settings' }
      ]
    };
  },

  methods: {
    openPage(index) {
      console.log(index);
      router.push(this.itemsUp[index].url);
    }
  }
};
</script>
